name: GOD ROLL
description:
My first game and I'd said that I'm satisfied with it. It was really tough to make anything in two days, but the result is somewhat decent I would say. 

Controls: A - strafe left, D - strafe right, Space - Jump, ESC - main menu.

Rules:

Bumping into object either increases or decreases your dice value (black number in the middle). Truck=3 points, Green building=2, white=1, hitting the ground reduces the value by 1 point.

The task is to reach the dice value that is requested in the top left corner.

You die if you stay in one place for too long.

Lore (a bit sad that I've not managed to add anything related to it):

The holy Trinity in the face of Father, Son and Holy spirit (represented as 3 spheres in the game, lol) play D&D as Paladin, Necromancer and Priest. They love D&D and they get the most luck when they throw dices on earth. Your task is to help God to get a perfect roll.
